channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: Trump grants pardons to Giuliani, Meadows, others linked to 2020 election efforts

item.title: People want to avoid ultra-processed foods. But experts struggle to define them

item.title: Countries are gathering for climate negotiations. Here's where the U.S. stands
item.description: Under President Trump, the U.S. has taken steps to roll back climate policies. Here are six significant changes.

item.title: Alaska's public schools can serve as emergency shelters. The buildings are in crisis
item.description: Alaska's public schools are being used as emergency shelters, though many of the buildings are crumbling.

item.title: Daughter of ex-South African President Jacob Zuma denies terrorism charges

item.title: US Senate to debate deal to end longest shutdown after overnight breakthrough
